response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the task, following the specified output format:

Referring Unresolved Customer Grievances

1. Review the customer grievance details and case history to understand the issue 2. Determine which department(s) would be best suited to investigate and resolve the grievance based on the nature of the complaint 3. Compile all relevant case information and documentation 4. Submit a referral to the appropriate department(s) with a request for further investigation 5. Notify the customer that their case has been escalated and provide them with the contact information for the investigating department(s) 6. Follow up with the investigating department(s) periodically to check on the progress of the case 7. Once a resolution has been reached, communicate the outcome to the customer and close out the grievance in the case management system
